alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 6:56PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT CHARLOTTE AND LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EST... At 655 PM EST, strong gusty winds are occuring on the back edge of the rain area across Charlotte and Lee Counties. Emergency management in Lee County has reported several power outages on the islands and a few others as the back edge of the rain moves inland. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Punta Gorda, Lehigh Acres, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Pineland, Buckingham, Villas, and East Dunbar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
